sources.title: Li'l Abner (1940)
sources.description: Li'l Abner becomes convinced that he is going to die within twenty-four hours, so agrees to marry two different girls: Daisy Mae (who has chased him for years) and Wendy Wilecat (who rescued him from an angry mob). It is all settled at the Sadie Hawkins Day race. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/lil-abner-1940/

sources.title: Li'l Abner (1940) COMEDY
sources.description:
Stars: Jeff York, Martha O'Driscoll, Buster Keaton
Writers: Charles Kerr, Tyler Johnson, Al Capp (original story)
Director: Albert S. Rogell

 The rural Southern community of Dogpatch, USA comes to life in this film based on the iconic comic strip by Al Capp.

metadata.Plot: The goings-on in the rural Southern community of Dogpatch, USA.
metadata.Writer: Charles Kerr, Tyler Johnson, Al Capp
metadata.Actors: Jeff York, Martha O'Driscoll, Mona Ray
